title: Akamai Is a Leader in Forrester New Wave: Microsegmentation
description: We are excited to be named a Leader in The Forrester New Wave?: Microsegmentation, Q1 2022. We were evaluated alongside eight other vendors in the microsegmentation space and ranked in 10 criteria, including product vision, interface and reporting, host agents, agentless aspect, product, and services support.
author: Ravit Greitser
